summary: A simple female dual wielding follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a follower named Verera to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. She is specialises as a Theif meaning that she is best in light armour with one-handed weapons and bows. If given two one-handed weapons she will dual wield them. She levels with the character starting from 10 upwards. She is also marriageable.

Installation: Simply place the .esp into your "Skyrim/Data" folder

This mod was made using vanilla assets and thus does not require any other mod to function at its best.

If you find any issues concerning this mod please leave a comment and if I can I will get right on it.

This mod has been on Steam Workshop for quite some time and I never got round to adding it to the nexus. Regardless it's here now. Enjoy.
author: Oblitarata -MGraham-
